<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4238</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Trip to the Shopping Centre</string>
            <string language="es">Un viaje al centro comercial</string>
            <string language="ga">Turas chuig an Ionad Siopadóireachta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Reise zum Einkaufszentrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un voyage au centre commercial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um desengate ao centro de shopping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un viaggio al centro commerciale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ταξίδι στο εμπορικό κέντρο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity is designed to enhance independence and help towards achieving the full potential of the student.  Practical application is necessary for understanding and learning to take place  Suitable for students with Mild/Moderate Special Needs.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta actividad está diseñada para aumentar la independencia y ayudar a  conseguir el pleno potencial del estudiante. Se necesita una aplicación práctica para entender y aprender a ir a lugares adecuados para estudiantes con necesidades especiales leves/mo</string>
            <string language="ga">Dearadh an ghníomhaíocht seo chun neamhspleáchas a fheabhsú agus chun cabhrú leis an dalta a chumas a chomhlíonadh. Teastaíonn cur i bhfedihm praiticiúil chun go dtarlódh tuiscint agus foghlaim.  Feiliúnach do mhic léinn le Riachtanais Speisialta Bhoga/Mh</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität ist konzipiert, um 
Unabhängigkeit zu erhöhen und in Richtung zum Erzielen des vollen 
Potentials des Kursteilnehmers zu helfen. Praktische Anwendung 
ist für das Verstehen und das Lernen stattzufinden verwendbar für 
Kursteilnehmer mit Mild/Moderate speziellen Notwendigkeiten notwendig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité est conçue pour mettre en valeur
l'indépendance et pour aider vers réaliser la pleine capacité de 
l'étudiant. L'application pratique est nécessaire pour 
l'arrangement et apprendre à avoir lieu approprié aux étudiants 
avec les besoins spéciaux de Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade é projetada realçar a 
independência e ajudá-la para a realização do potencial cheio do 
estudante. A aplicação prática é necessária para 
compreender e aprender ocorrer apropriado para estudantes com 
necessidades especiais de Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività è destinata per aumentare 
l'indipendenza ed aiutare verso realizzare la piena capacità 
dell'allievo. L'applicazione pratica è necessaria per capire ed
imparare avvenire adatto ad allievi con i bisogni speciali di 
Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα έχει ως σκοπό να ενισχύσει την 
ανεξαρτησία και να βοηθήσει προς την επίτευξη της πλήρους 
δυνατότητας του σπουδαστή. Η πρακτική εφαρμογή είναι 
απαραίτητη για την κατανόηση και η εκμάθηση να πραγματοποιείται 
κατάλληλος για τους σπουδαστές με ήπιο/συγκρατεί τις ειδικές 
ανάγκες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
